de99563b-3d04-48b0-98fa-afbd32b15dde.content: Implemented GraphRAG federated qualitative assessor contract v1 with deterministic scoring, local model consensus, guardrail caps, schema, and tests; benchmark query invocation fixed and profile outputs persisted.

79119116-d224-4074-be05-1b87e753fdda.content: GraphRAG benchmark hardening cycle: enforced strict no-placeholder behavior in benchmark validation, tuned community report prompts for schema-safe JSON, and verified end-to-end run with Qwen2.5-0.5B local model returning informative answer ('Kael and Seraphina are lovers').

6d29e3db-ed4f-4263-a64f-02b5d1d15fe8.content: Verified runtime fix: Eidos MCP launcher now defaults stateless HTTP for streamable transport, preventing stale-session failures for Codex/Gemini tool calls.

67a18bc0-e63d-46b4-a2a3-f0944e42bf11.content: Implemented centralized service port registry at config/ports.json with helper APIs and CLI, and switched major service launch paths to registry fallback when env vars are unset/empty.

0665c231-2300-4988-9d51-d9c9498f3823.content: Implemented canonical port registry rollout with config/ports.json and registry fallback wiring across MCP/doc/LLM/Ollama/web/file/consciousness entrypoints; added docs/PORT_REGISTRY.md and scripts/port_registry.py; standardized shebangs to /usr/bin/env for touched shell/python launch scripts.

b71f0b1a-ad48-4621-a875-7201256fed4b.content: GraphRAG model sweep executed on 2026-02-19 with federated judges: qwen_0_5b won (rank A, score 0.8801, index 38.733s, query 17.535s); llama_3_2_1b ranked B and failed strict non-informative query gate.

eb3f1761-2dfd-4a53-841b-e0a0caf1f38a.content: Manual verification of GraphRAG sweep on 2026-02-19 found qwen_0_5b returned grounded answer while llama_3_2_1b produced non-informative query output; judge-pathology issue identified where llama judge emitted all-zero scores even in high-confidence deterministic contexts.

61b6dabd-b964-47cb-ae32-7cc4f25c447b.content: Committed and pushed commit 1e100b9fea: adds living knowledge pipeline script, code_forge dedup/trace CLI and DB capabilities, GraphRAG judge inconsistency mitigation, MCP tool living_knowledge_pipeline_run, and associated tests/docs.

1ba2d2ae-6aa3-48e1-ad29-cf5d67b88131.content: After scorer hardening, reran full GraphRAG sweep at 2026-02-19T09:49:35Z: qwen_0_5b won with score 0.8848 rank A and grounded query answer; llama_3_2_1b remained bench_fail with non-informative query path and rank C.

f5de71b5-c6f1-4563-8f53-96dd4d53d067.content: Implemented curated local model catalog and downloader automation for <=3B models, including tool-calling focused models and Qwen2-VL-2B multimodal with mmproj. Added multi-domain benchmark suite scaffold with deterministic and federated judge scoring.

2aab3be7-0302-4e77-b0d7-11e06f274579.content: Completed local-model expansion to <=3B family plus Qwen2-VL-2B multimodal and Nomic embeddings. Multi-domain suite results: qwen_1_5b won judged text run (0.625), qwen2_vl_2b scored 0.8057 with vision_ocr=1.0, qwen_3b deterministic run scored 1.0. GraphRAG strict quality gate passed with qwen_0_5b (A=0.9121).

7c5b10d3-40f0-4c9b-b702-7f426f14ed32.content: Pushed commit a5873193ae after rebasing onto origin/main. Added model catalog, downloader automation, model-domain benchmark suite, docs, and memory/KB updates; revalidated with 21 passing tests after rebase.

ea24c7c2-126b-42fb-b1b9-d2b6e0d05437.content: Code Forge archive digester v1 foundation implemented: deterministic repo intake index, duplication index (exact/normalized/near), explainable triage labels with CSV/JSON/markdown outputs, and full digest orchestration command integrated with knowledge/graphrag exports.

797da7db-d157-4209-80fe-a3e6b4345181.content: Code Forge elevation cycle completed and pushed in commit dedb968da9 after rebase. Added archive digester pipeline, multi-language analysis, fingerprint-based dedup, semantic search, explainable triage artifacts, CLI commands (catalog/triage-report/digest), and updated living knowledge pipeline integration.

362e7ae7-203e-439d-9daa-619652c612a7.content: Code Forge enhancement cycle completed: added import/call/use relationship extraction, dependency graph artifact generation, benchmark+regression gate suite, canonical migration plan with staged compatibility shims, and validated all with passing code_forge tests.

e3942a21-0a60-42fe-843e-f5599ae61dc3.content: Pushed Code Forge phase upgrade commit f911629d49 after rebase. Added dependency edge extraction/import-call-use graphing, benchmark regression gate suite with baseline artifacts, canonical migration planner and shim staging, plus updated docs/tests and living knowledge pipeline integration.

ef6da16f-8891-421b-9339-f06a97ce0d20.content: Code Forge hardening cycle added structural clone clustering, triage confidence with rule audit traces, strict digester artifact schema validation, and validate-artifacts CLI. Bench regression gate now uses absolute delta guards to reduce noisy false positives on Termux.

5fc66225-b582-4f63-b92d-5d6c57e63cdb.content: Code Forge continuation cycle completed and pushed at commit 16aca8e692: structural clone detection, strict artifact schema validation command, triage confidence audit tracing, and hardened benchmark regression gates integrated with digest workflow.

711f3854-47d2-4908-8515-536f13747ffe.content: Code Forge drift intelligence upgrade implemented: run_archive_digester now emits drift_report.json/md and persists history snapshots, with CLI drift-report command and optional drift schema validation.

b59d8897-9edb-4d8b-8444-57aa953fe0a2.content: Implemented RAC-AP construct validation subsystem in agent_forge: added consciousness validation module with protocolized nomological expectations, reliability scoring, convergent/discriminant checks, security-boundary summary, and gate-based RAC-AP index persisted to reports/consciousness_validation.
